body: @:TF: Yes, and many of them end up mistreated. I would like to see an NTR where they show that, because they always make it look like the MC is the only loser, when the real loser is the girl. Although I think I dream too much, because NTR always shows, on the contrary, that the girl will be happy as long as she has sex. LOL
1 day, the normals of nhentai will know what ntr means. One day they’ll realize it’s purely emotional on the side of a mc.
I pretty sure girl in real life is not that dumb
For those asking if it's NTR, try to understand that the main characters of netorare doujinshi don't need to be married or going out for a story to be considered NTR. Think outside the box
How do you get NTR’d when that’s not even your girl?
It can't be helped... Just find another girl
When youre not just a beta cuck but a cuck fluffer
Tell me you're a beta without telling me you are a beta.

I have seen aunts/cousins/random peeps in my life go down this girls path and some of them even married the abuser and stayed together for decades if not the rest of their lives, its fckn sad honestly cause those peeps were usually the very soft spoken and nice people at least when I knew em before they mixed with that crowd
netorare? are we reading the same hentai?
NTR? Are you sure?
@SchrodingerZ we can only dream
When will the day be when the NTR girl suffers the consequences of her bad decisions? Either the author never shows her (as here), or he simply raises the stupidity that she is happy as a whore. LOL

I completely agree with @RonaldGrand6969. This could happen in real life, but that's only halfway to being realistic because there are no consequences. The only consequence we see is that MC lost her friend. But most of the consequences will be for the girl. She can end up with the boyfriend in the worst way: heartbroken, pregnant, beaten, etc. There are many possibilities, but they are never shown on NTR (which takes a lot of weight away from it story-wise).
@rararulz yeah..

LOL
This actually happen in real life, believe it or not
The guy is too dumb, if only he bravely enough to confess or protect her

Let's be real though, while shy youth does exist for smart individuals like this girl (at least it's portrayed with the studying away from everyone) peer pressure who probably work on this girl, however I think being convinced to fuck a few days into a relationship, for someone who's probably smart enough to know the risks, over thinks shyly about the smallest thing (i.e possible layer regret) this is only half of the way realistic. At least for a large majority.

ah yes Hitoi and Terasu MC. 
Can only make NTR content.
So this what happens when you dont shot your shoot bois
how is this NTR?

@king1919djdj what u talking about? this is realistic compared to most ntr. There are passive people that just can’t say NO and let things happen to them. This is usually the result of lonely/very strict upbringing forcing those kids find joy in pleasing others.
So does the narrator even care? If not, then this is pretty accurate. People start and end sexual relationships all the time in school. No one really cares especially once you start college.
is this really NTR though?  Seems like they were only just friends and nothing more than that.

I like the term of thinking it would be vanilla wholesome but it turns out to be ntr shit as "NTrapped"
Has that exist before?

@king1919djdj usually NTR have stupid and impossible plot, but this one? This is pretty common, and i've seen it a lot IRL. A shy girl being pressured into a relationship with someone, and then being forced to do something she eventually regret due to her being uncapable of saying "no".
I hate artist like these lol
well just pointing it out but this shit is pretty much impossible to happen and is the authors disgusting attempt at portraying his "beta"ness
Peer pressured into going out with some dude, then having your first time recorded and distributed? That shit's fucked.
I feel bad for the girl more for some reason. Well... As long as she's happy I guess?
